Member Function Documentation

◆ GetFileInfo() [1/2]

FileInfo IonicSecurity::SDK::FileCrypto::GetFileInfo ( array< System::Byte >^  mpbArrayBytes)
static

Determines if a file is Ionic protected and various pieces of information about the file.

Parameters
[in]mpbArrayBytesThe input buffer assumed to be binary ciphertext.
Returns
Returns a FileInfo object that describes the file. If an error occurs while processing the file (for example, a file is recognized but corrupted), an SdkException will be thrown.

◆ GetFileInfo() [2/2]

FileInfo IonicSecurity::SDK::FileCrypto::GetFileInfo ( String ^  msFileName)
static

Determines if a file is Ionic protected and various pieces of information about the file.

Parameters
[in]msFileNameThe input file path.
Returns
Returns a FileInfo object that describes the file. If an error occurs while processing the file (for example, a file is recognized but corrupted), an SdkException will be thrown.
